DOC.detailed_description: This phase II study investigate weekly dose docetaxel combination capecitabine advance gastric gastro-esophageal adenocarcinoma . Docetaxel 30mg/m2 administer day 1 8 cycle capecitabine 825mg/m2 bid ( total daily dose 1650mg/m2 ) administer orally 14 day ( day 1-14 ) cycle . Each cycle 21 day . Subjects receive unlimited cycle docetaxel capecitabine evidence disease progression unacceptable side effect .
